fields.description:
Druid storage handler CTAS fails with the exception below when a Boolean column is included.
A simple workaround would be to add a cast to string over the boolean column, this will lead to index the column as a druid dimension with value `true` or `false`.

{code}

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Druid storage handler CTAS with boolean type columns fails.
